Hello Wipeout

So how do you build a wipeout application? It's pretty simple, all you need is a root view model class, a template and a knockout binding.

The view model

// create a namespace for our application window.helloWipeout = {}; helloWipeout.rootApplication = wo.view.extend(function () { // call the base constructor. The constructor for wo.view takes in a template id. this._super("helloWipeout.rootApplication"); });

The Template

<script type="text/xml" id="helloWipeout.rootApplication"> <div> Hello <span data-bind="text: model().name"></span>! </div> </script>

Creating the application

<div id="helloWipeoutApp" data-bind="wipeout: helloWipeout.rootApplication"></div> <script type="text/javascript"> var rootApp = document.getElementById("helloWipeoutApp"); ko.applyBindings({ name: "Wipeout" }, rootApp); </script>

This will ultimately render: <div> Hello <span>Wipeout</span>! </div>

When you apply the wipeout binding, it will search for the view model "helloWipeout.rootApplication". An instance of this view model is created and it's model property will be set with the value passed into ko.applyBindings. This is where the "Wipeout" in "Hello Wipeout!" comes from.

So, all together:

<html> <head> <title>Hello Wipeout</title> </head> <body> <!-- The application placeholder --> <div data-bind="wipeout: helloWipeout.rootApplication"></div> <!-- The application view model template--> <script type="text/xml" id="helloWipeout.rootApplication"> <div> Hello <span data-bind="text: model"></span>! </div> </script> <!-- Required scripts --> <script type="text/javascript" src="knockout.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="wipeout.js"></script> <!-- The application view model --> <script type="text/javascript"></div> // create a namespace for our application window.helloWipeout = {}; helloWipeout.rootApplication = wo.view.extend(function () { // call the base constructor. The constructor for wo.view takes in a template id. this._super("helloWipeout.rootApplication"); }); </script> <!-- The application definition--> <script type="text/javascript"> var rootApp = document.getElementById("helloWipeoutApp"); ko.applyBindings("Wipeout", rootApp); </script> </body> </html>
